subject: World Cup (Soccer)
Soccer
Baseball
lead_paragraph: It was not a very good year for Americans in international sports. But for a reporter crisscrossing Germany on trains that make Amtrak look even more pathetic, the World Cup was a joy.
snippet: It was not a very good year for Americans in international sports. But for a reporter crisscrossing Germany on trains that make Amtrak look even more pathetic, the World Cup was a joy.
